name: Newton (itch) (nerdur)
description:
Newton the cat and his friends are on a mission to finally settle one of the biggest questions that has plagued cats for centuries. Does gravity affect everything? 

The method chosen is by simply trying to throw down as many things as possible from the shelves and document the results. 

Your job is to make sure things don't break and put them back on the shelves. Try not to hit the cats. 

The cats are controlled by an increadibly advanced CatAI, based on latest research. 

This game should be played on mobile or with a mouse. Need to practice anger management? Use touchpad...

I have used tiles from

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs

And the cat animation comes from https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites
